member.name: M:Acme.WebApiLibrary.MoreData.Controllers.DataController.Data(System.Int32)
member.summary: Minimal sample implementation of named backend-to-frontend/backend service.
member.remarks:
Supported arguments: 0 is default value and the Ok case, 1..3 give errors.
* Ok result - returns array of two strings * 1: 500 - InternalServerErrror, some exception * 2: 400 - BadRequest with title * 3: 404 - NotFound
member.param: A value 0..3 for different error conditions.
member.returns: An array with two sample strings.

member.name: M:Acme.WebApiLibrary.MoreData.Controllers.SettingsController.Settings
member.summary: Displays all Amce settings and a summary of all validation errors (if any)
member.returns: An array of groups with configuration information.
